com.stormpath.sdk.saml

Interface SamlIdentityProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Auditable, Deletable, Resource, Saveable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultSamlIdentityProvider

    public interface SamlIdentityProvider
extends Resource, Saveable, Deletable, Auditable
    A SamlIdentityProvider represents data supporting Stormpath as an saml identity provider.
    Since:
    1.3.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AuthnVerification createAuthnVerification(AuthnVerificationRequest request)
      Given an AuthnVerificationRequest wrapping an incoming SAML AuthnRequest, verifies that the request targets a RegisteredSamlServiceProvider that is registered with this identity provider, and validates the signature of the request if one is provided.
      SamlResponse createSamlResponse(CreateSamlResponseRequest samlResponseRequest)
      Given a CreateSamlResponseRequest for a given Account and RegisteredSamlServiceProvider, creates a SamlResponse wrapping the XML of the SAML response to be returned to the service provider.
      SamlServiceProviderRegistration createSamlServiceProviderRegistration(CreateSamlServiceProviderRegistrationRequest createSamlServiceProviderRegistrationRequest)
      Creates a SamlServiceProviderRegistration registering a RegisteredSamlServiceProvider with this identity provider.
      SamlServiceProviderRegistration createSamlServiceProviderRegistration(SamlServiceProviderRegistration samlServiceProviderRegistration)
      Creates a SamlServiceProviderRegistration registering a RegisteredSamlServiceProvider with this identity provider.
      AttributeStatementMappingRules getAttributeStatementMappingRules()
      Returns the rules for mapping SAML Assertion Attributes to Stormpath Account attributes for Accounts created in the associated Stormpath Directory.
      RegisteredSamlServiceProviderList getRegisteredSamlServiceProviders()
      Returns the list of RegisteredSamlServiceProviders as RegisteredSamlServiceProviderList for which Stormpath serves as an identity provider.
      RegisteredSamlServiceProviderList getRegisteredSamlServiceProviders(RegisteredSamlServiceProviderCriteria criteria)
      Returns a paginated list of the samlIdentityProviders's assigned registeredSamlServiceProviders that match the specified query criteria.
      SamlIdentityProviderMetadata getSamlIdentityProviderMetadata()
      Returns the samlIdentityProvider's metadata.
      SamlServiceProviderRegistrationList getSamlServiceProviderRegistrations()
      Returns the list of SamlServiceProviderRegistrations as SamlServiceProviderRegistrationList which is held by this identity provider.
      SamlServiceProviderRegistrationList getSamlServiceProviderRegistrations(SamlServiceProviderRegistrationCriteria criteria)
      Returns a paginated list of the samlIdentityProviders's assigned samlServiceProviderRegistrations that match the specified query criteria.
      String getShaFingerprint()
      Returns the samlIdentityProvider's SHA fingerprint.
      String getSignatureAlgorithm()
      Returns the samlIdentityProvider's signature algorithm.
      Map<String,String> getSsoLoginEndpoint()
      Returns the samlIdentityProvider's sso login endpoint.
      SamlIdentityProviderStatus getStatus()
      Returns the samlIdentityProvider's status.
      Map<String,String> getX509SigninCert()
      Returns the samlIdentityProvider's x509 Signin Certificate.
      SamlIdentityProvider setAttributeStatementMappingRules(AttributeStatementMappingRules attributeStatementMappingRules)
      Sets the rules for mapping SAML Assertion Attributes to Stormpath Account attributes for Accounts created in the associated Stormpath Directory.
      SamlIdentityProvider setShaFingerprint(String shaFingerprint)
      Sets the samlIdentityProvider's SHA fingerprint.
      SamlIdentityProvider setSignatureAlgorithm(String signatureAlgorithm)
      Sets the samlIdentityProvider's signature algorithm.
      SamlIdentityProvider setSsoLoginEndpoint(Map<String,String> ssoLoginEndpoint)
      Sets the samlIdentityProvider's sso login endpoint.
      SamlIdentityProvider setStatus(SamlIdentityProviderStatus status)
      Sets the samlIdentityProvider's status.
      SamlIdentityProvider setX509SigninCert(Map<String,String> x509SigninCert)
      Sets the samlIdentityProvider's x509 Signin Certificate.

      • getRegisteredSamlServiceProviders

        RegisteredSamlServiceProviderList getRegisteredSamlServiceProviders(RegisteredSamlServiceProviderCriteria criteria)
        Returns a paginated list of the samlIdentityProviders's assigned registeredSamlServiceProviders that match the specified query criteria. The SamlIdentityProviders utility class is available to help construct the criteria DSL - most modern IDEs can auto-suggest and auto-complete as you type, allowing for an easy query-building experience. For example: 
         samlIdentityProvider.getRegisteredSamlServiceProviders(RegisteredSamlServiceProviders.where(
     RegisteredSamlServiceProviders.createdAt().equals("2016-01-01")
     .offsetBy(20)
     .limitTo(25));
        or, if you use static imports: 
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        criteria - the criteria to use when performing a request to the collection.
        

        Returns:
        

        a paginated list of the samlIdentityProvider's samlServiceProviderRegistrations that match the specified query criteria.

        createSamlServiceProviderRegistration
        

        SamlServiceProviderRegistration createSamlServiceProviderRegistration(CreateSamlServiceProviderRegistrationRequest createSamlServiceProviderRegistrationRequest)
        

        Creates a SamlServiceProviderRegistration registering a RegisteredSamlServiceProvider with this identity provider.
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        createSamlServiceProviderRegistrationRequest - the CreateSamlServiceProviderRegistrationRequest which the creation of the SamlServiceProviderRegistration is based upon.
        

        Returns:
        

        the SamlServiceProviderRegistration.

      • 

        getSamlServiceProviderRegistrations
        

        SamlServiceProviderRegistrationList getSamlServiceProviderRegistrations(SamlServiceProviderRegistrationCriteria criteria)
        

        Returns a paginated list of the samlIdentityProviders's assigned samlServiceProviderRegistrations that match the specified query criteria.  The
 SamlIdentityProviders utility class is available to help construct
 the criteria DSL - most modern IDEs can auto-suggest and auto-complete as you type, allowing for an easy
 query-building experience.  For example:
 
         samlIdentityProvider.getSamlServiceProviderRegistrations(SamlServiceProviderRegistrations.where(
     SamlServiceProviderRegistrations.createdAt().equals("2016-01-01")
     .offsetBy(20)
     .limitTo(25));
 
        
 or, if you use static imports:
 
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        criteria - the criteria to use when performing a request to the collection.
        

        Returns:
        

        a paginated list of the samlIdentityProvider's samlServiceProviderRegistrations that match the specified query criteria.
        

        

        • 

      




        

      • 

        createAuthnVerification
        

        AuthnVerification createAuthnVerification(AuthnVerificationRequest request)
        

        Given an AuthnVerificationRequest wrapping an incoming SAML AuthnRequest, verifies that the request targets a
 RegisteredSamlServiceProvider that is registered with this identity provider, and validates the signature of
 the request if one is provided.
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        request - the request to be verified.
        

        Returns:
        

        an AuthnVerification containing the state to be passed along during the SAML flow.
        

        

        • 

      




        

      • 

        createSamlResponse
        

        SamlResponse createSamlResponse(CreateSamlResponseRequest samlResponseRequest)
        

        Given a CreateSamlResponseRequest for a given Account and RegisteredSamlServiceProvider,
 creates a SamlResponse wrapping the XML of the SAML response to be returned to the service provider.
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        samlResponseRequest - a CreateSamlResponseRequest wrapping the values needed to prepare the SAML response.
        

        Returns:
        

        a SamlResponse wrapping the XML of the SAML response to be returned to the service provider.
